about_the_game:
⚠️WARNING: THIS GAME IS VERY DIFFICULT, BUT IT INCLUDES AN EASY MODE TO HELP YOU DISCOVER IT.⚠️

Welcome to ANGRY PENGUIN, a game inspired by the style of old school 3D games from the Nintendo 64, PS1, or even Dreamcast, as well as the most infuriating games on the Steam store, but with a twist – you play as a PENGUIN!
But our friend, the penguin, is no ordinary bird; he is ANGRY.
And no, his anger isn't about inflation, rising medical bills, or global warming; It's because he's searching for his eggs, which mysteriously got scattered on an island... (luckily, he has a boating license)

Take on the role of ANGRY PENGUIN in this challenging platformer with numerous and varied trials, where each step is more difficult than the last.
Can you discover all its secrets ?

Oh, I heard you were a speedrun enthusiast? Well, you're in luck. The game features an integrated timer, so no need to worry about LiveSplit when you want to start a playthrough! (Note: There is no BLJ in ANGRY PENGUIN) (probably).

Discovered the FIRST SOLO MAP of ANGRY PENGUIN, The abandoned island.

Over time, more maps and modes will be added. A multiplayer mode is also planned, but don't be too impatient; I'm handling development solo (fortunately, not on graphics!).

highlighted.name: Was that really an easy mode ?
